conversion_verification.notes: True 3D transformation with accurate height, wall thickness, and isometric cutaway view.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D representation. Walls have proper height/thickness and corner geometry is precisely rendered.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Layout is highly faithful. All rooms are present and correctly positioned. Proportions match the original plan exactly.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement and scale are accurate. Beds, kitchen fixtures, and living room elements aligned with the original 2D symbols.

visual_clarity.notes: Very high clarity and clean rendering. Deductions applied for residual text labels ('KITCHEN', 'BALCONY', etc.) on the 3D floor plane.

detected_errors.description: Text labels from the 2D plan were projected onto the 3D floors, which is a presentation artifact.

summary: An exceptionally faithful 3D conversion that preserves the exact geometry and furniture layout of the original floor plan with high structural clarity.
